title: Patent Holder - Virtual Cloth Trial Model
description: Patent holder for 'Efficient Online Cloth Size Prediction and Virtual Cloth Trial Model,' published in the Official Journal of the Patent Office of India, Journal No. 36/2021. Innovation in garment size prediction with 85% accuracy.

title: AWS Certified AI Practitioner
description: Proactively pursued and achieved the AWS Certified AI Practitioner certification, also earning the early adopter badge. Demonstrates expertise in AI/ML services on AWS including foundational AI concepts, generative AI, and responsible AI practices.

title: GATE 2020 - All India Rank 1388 (98.57 Percentile)
description: Achieved All-India Rank 1388 with 98.57 percentile in GATE 2020, Computer Science among 100,000+ candidates. Conducted by IISc Bangalore and IIT, demonstrating strong fundamentals in computer science and engineering.

title: Master's Degree - Deep Learning Specialization
description: Completed M.S. in Computer Science with specialization in Deep Learning from Pennsylvania State University. Focused on advanced machine learning, deep neural networks, computer vision, and AI applications in healthcare.

title: Research Publication - Parkinsonian Disease Classification
issuer: Penn State Health Milton S. Hershey Medical Center
description: Developed deep learning model for classifying Atypical Parkinsonian diseases using MRI scans, achieving 80% accuracy. Research conducted in collaboration with Penn State Health Milton S. Hershey Medical Center.

title: 50% Efficiency Improvement - Medical Insights
description: Architected Gen AI SaaS application that reduced medical insight delivery time by 50% through automated analysis using serverless RAG pipeline, LLMs, and vector search. Delivered measurable business impact in healthcare technology.

title: Full Stack Web Development Training
description: Completed comprehensive training in Full Stack Web Development including Angular, React, JavaScript, TypeScript, Bootstrap, Git, HTML5, CSS3, MongoDB, and SQL. Built strong foundation in modern web technologies.

title: DevOps & Cloud Technologies Training
description: Completed intensive training in DevOps and Cloud Technologies including Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, and CI/CD pipelines. Focused on automation, scalability, and cloud-based application deployment.

title: Team Leadership - KPMG Cloud Deployment
description: Successfully led team of 4 engineers to deploy microservices architecture for KPMG International on Azure Cloud, provisioning 16+ services and achieving 99.9% uptime. Demonstrated technical leadership and project management skills.

title: Infrastructure Automation - 40% Time Reduction
description: Implemented Terraform modules for DNS, IAM, and IAM User Access, reducing infrastructure provisioning time by 40% on Google Cloud Platform. Optimized Dockerfile practices via Python automation, reducing image size by 35%.

title: CI/CD Pipeline Optimization
description: Designed and built CI/CD pipelines for Kubernetes clusters, automating deployment and scaling. Reduced deployment time by 50% and ensured 99.9% uptime for enterprise applications.

title: Bachelor of Engineering - Computer Engineering
description: Completed Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering from Pune University with strong foundation in computer science fundamentals, algorithms, data structures, and software development.
